questions.question: The first IPL season was held in 2007.
IPL 2020 was entirely hosted in the UAE due to COVID-19 restrictions.
Chennai Super Kings won the 2010 IPL season.
Rohit Sharma holds the record for most runs in a single IPL season.
IPL 2013 was the first season to implement the DRS system.
The 2014 IPL season was co-hosted by UAE and India.
Gujarat Titans won the 2022 IPL season in their debut appearance.
IPL 2009 was held in South Africa.
The 2021 IPL season was completed in a single phase without interruptions.
